website_summaries.verdict: If you lust after the latest Android software and cool new features in the Google Pixel XL, but are turned off by large phones, the 5-inch Pixel is a superb alternative.
cons: No waterproofing, expandable storage, or wireless charging

customer_reviews.title: didn't come with a UK 3 pin plug
customer_reviews.text: Didn't come with UK plug which I didn't realise from the product description.
customer_reviews.author: hammertime32

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this phone, the best i've ever had. Very durable and quick
customer_reviews.author: Dom

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Amazing phone, and if you like taking pictures this is the phone for you.
customer_reviews.author: Adi Cannings

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely amazing product 🤩
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing product. Still on the latest software version so its still really rapid even in 2019 it's perfect for taking for photos and if you are a snap chatter and use android this is the phone for you
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: simple good phone
customer_reviews.text: thank you for the service, delivered fast; i have it from 26 jan and it is really good ! not fancy, but depends on your priorities .
customer_reviews.author: roxy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing phone.
customer_reviews.text: Blazingly fast, crisp colours. Battery life top of the range. Great that it has newest version of Android. Top notch product overall.
customer_reviews.author: Matrix

customer_reviews.title: Very expensive but it's an amazing phone. Superior to the iphone 7 in terms ...
customer_reviews.text: Very expensive but it's an amazing phone. Superior to the iphone 7 in terms of software and hardware. Blazing fast, camera outstanding and good solid batery. the only downside is the price.
customer_reviews.author: ninooo

customer_reviews.title: The best Android phone
customer_reviews.text: Currently the best phone on market. What else I can say?
customer_reviews.author: Roman Lipka

customer_reviews.title: Hight price but high quilty
customer_reviews.text: Really fancy andriod phone for me!!! 5 inch is just perfect fit me, but I am really regret that I forgot to buy a case for my phone, lol. So far no big problem from the phonw, just I can't open my Google Play while connect my own wifi at home, but data can do it, and I dont why for now. And the price is really really high purchce on Amazon. But fro me, it's the only way to get this phone, so well, I have to accept it.
customer_reviews.author: Wu kun

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it
customer_reviews.text: Awful no sounds at all not ringing only vibration no sounds from receiving call or when calling Piece of Crap No service offered in qatar cause I bought it online such big wast
customer_reviews.author: Maryam I. alsulaiti

customer_reviews.title: Google Pixel
customer_reviews.text: The mobile itself is one of the best I have had, it works like a dream, the camera is amazing although becomes crap when the light is poor due to its high aperture, sadly the phone was scratched up at the back in a bad way, however the front and the camera part at the back had zero scratches so I just use a case as I would anyway and all is good.
customer_reviews.author: Daz

customer_reviews.title: Great phone. Camera is top notch
customer_reviews.text: Great phone. Camera is top notch. Super fast charging time and battery life has been good. I listen to Google play music during the day and there is still plenty of battery life at home time.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Duncan Phin

customer_reviews.title: Super fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone, already had one before. It arrived very quickly. The only negative thing is that it came with a small scratch on the screen.
customer_reviews.author: Penny

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing phone! The camera is brilliant and the interface is beautiful! Well played Google, well played.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Bassett

customer_reviews.title: Is sim locked
customer_reviews.text: Was told it was sim free which it wasnt which means i need to buy a new sim card and number and change it to everyone because it was not advertised as only EE
customer_reviews.author: Junko Kirigiri

customer_reviews.title: Shut down forever after 2 years of use (5 months after warranty expired)
customer_reviews.text: I would urge anyone considering a Pixel phone to reconsider. I never had any issues with the OG Pixel but was charging it when it simply shut down, never to turn on again. I've lost all data (apart from that saved with Google). Google UK hasn't been able to repair it as it was sent by Amazon via an American company. iSmash say it's an issue with the motherboard and can't replace it. Checking out forums online tells me many others have this issue as well. Simply outrageous that such an expensive phone can be so unreliable! Theft, if you ask me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this via a UK retail store over a year ago and I've to say it's still an excellent phone one year on. I have had no issues with it and the camera is excellent. Even better than the iPhone as I've been told jealously by iPhone/Apple enthusiasts. I would highly recommend this product, or the latest version of the PIXEL phone from Google.
customer_reviews.author: BenC

customer_reviews.title: Google Pixel (White) Phone.
customer_reviews.text: Good phone but the Batt is really bad always have to keep charging it.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: crap
customer_reviews.text: mic + headphone jack stopped working within 2 months of use
customer_reviews.author: Farhan

customer_reviews.title: It's just a bit too expensive but I like it.
customer_reviews.text: A pretty nifty phone, fast and silky to use but it's just a bit too expensive. I was hoping that the savings would pass on to the customer when buying a phone made by a tax dodging corporation from the site of a tax dodging corporation. Hmm, maybe I should have got a cheaper phone and donated the rest to the NHS on Google's behalf.
customer_reviews.author: Darren Burgess

customer_reviews.title: I would be satisfy if there is any explanation about the phone price
customer_reviews.text: I would be satisfy if there is any explanation about the phone price. Short example, I've paid 12-15 £for a memory card. When you buy this, you need pay around 100. I was educated to understand and appreciate the real value of things. Shortly, I can have a powerful laptop for half price. Or the ideea is: big price, after go half...hmm strange marketing,regarding 719£and 819£price for a new phone on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Eduard Mihai Barbuti

customer_reviews.title: I really like this pixel
customer_reviews.text: I really like the look of this phone I haven't bought it yet but I seen videos on YouTube I'm hoping to get it soon
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Over priced and not the best looking phone
customer_reviews.text: Bought mine through Carphone warehouse black Friday sale. This phone is a bit over priced, it's just crazy priced on Amazon, resellers trying to overcharge big time. Pro's Screen is bright and clear (should be qhd though) Call quality is superb. Feels pretty quick when flicking through apps, games etc.. Camera is fantastic. Con's Its not the best looking phone available, but it does grow on you. Some reports of loose volume rocker key rattle Price is far to high, especially via Amazon resellers it's not like there is a shortage of them!
customer_reviews.author: Stuart Rome

customer_reviews.title: Amazing phone with an incredible camera
customer_reviews.text: Awesome phone. Takes beautiful photos and videos and has unlimited storage. I'm sick of filling up my apple icloud only to be told to keep upgrading and paying more. Pair this with the google daydream and you can view your panoramic photos in virtual reality with sound recording. It's like stepping into a memory. Hard to describe unless you try it yourself. Also the phone has an awesome battery, you don't have to keep thinking about recharging all the time.
customer_reviews.author: AndyR1

customer_reviews.title: Excellent.
customer_reviews.text: Best smart phone I have ever had: in terms of interface, open source flexibiilty, hardware, reliability. Game changer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Same like other Samsung phone
customer_reviews.text: Over priced product. Same like other Samsung phone. Poor battery just 2700mAh, is nothing for smart phone. I don't think this phone will win the place in market. Only camera is great ...
customer_reviews.author: Fakhar Rajar

product_meta.title: Google Pixel 32GB 12MP SIM-Free Smartphone in Black
product_meta.description:
Colour Name:Quite Black| Customer Package Type:69.512 MONTH WARRANTY. Unlocked. Fully tested and restored to factory settings by our in-house technicians. Posted with USB cable only

LEGAL DISCLAIMER
BRAND NEW. LOCKED TO EE. ORIGINAL BOX + CABLES. Box opened to verify contents.
feature_bullets: 1st Generation Pixel, Phone by Google; Unlocked for use with all GSM Carriers Worldwide (carriers that use a SIM card such as AT&T and T-Mobile).
Google Assistant: Find store hours, weekend weather, last night's scores and so much more.
5-inch Vivid cinematic gorgeous display, Seamless glass-aluminum body.
Google Photos: Say goodbye to those storage is full" notifications!
For Compatability: Please confirm with your carrier for compatibility.

specifications.Delivery information:: We cannot deliver certain products outside mainland UK ( ). We will only be able to confirm if this product can be delivered to your chosen address when you enter your delivery address at checkout.
